Title: Relates to cost sharing fees for outpatient treatment at a substance use treatment program
Summary: Provides that for a substance use disorder outpatient treatment episode of care by a provider licensed, certified or otherwise authorized by the office of addiction services and supports, an insured shall only be responsible for a cost sharing fee not to exceed five hundred dollars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to certain cost sharing fees for outpatient treatment at a substance use treatment program
